## isThreadMainMessage() function

Determines if a given message is a main thread message. i.e.: a message that is the starting message for a thread.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isThreadMainMessage(message: IUserMessage): message is IThreadMainMessage;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

message


</td><td>

[IUserMessage](./zrocket-contracts.iusermessage.md)


</td><td>

The message to check.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

message is [IThreadMainMessage](./zrocket-contracts.ithreadmainmessage.md)

`true` if the message is a main thread message, otherwise `false`<!-- -->.
